name: Sunder Realms
description:
Welcome to Sunder Realms!

This is a short yet fascinating game that I made (pretty much the first complete game I ever made). It's full of surprises and a story line that will hopefully help you understand some vital aspects of life, which can only be unraveled by you.

This project would not be possible without the help of a few assets (see in game credits and 'about' page).

This game is free but any and all donations are greatly appreciated! I hope you enjoy it!
